sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Remove definitions with empty definition IDs from usageanalytics_count_cfg</description> <name>Remove Empty Definition IDs</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('usageanalytics_count_cfg'); gr.addEncodedQuery('definition_idISEMPTY'); gr.addQuery('count_type','Licensing'); gr.setWorkflow(false); gr.deleteMultiple(); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-03-15 21:35:20</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3377244dc3d28110aea12ed8b540dd2f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Remove Empty Definition IDs</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Subscription Administration Base" source="com.snc.usage_admin.base">f56830a03cf1311068bcf327dfe37f31</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3377244dc3d28110aea12ed8b540dd2f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-15 21:35:20</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
